languages.text: "Лорд-инквизитор Ксавьер Калькасар, глава конклава Коронус. Милостью {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, я уполномочен надзирать за {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простором Коронус{/g}, искоренять ереси и предупреждать угрозу {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}". {n}Породистое лицо и роскошная седеющая грива больше подходят аристократу, чем служителю пугающей {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-инквизитор Ксавьер Калькасар, глава конклава Коронус. Милостью Императора, я уполномочен надзирать за Простором, искоренять ереси и предупреждать угрозу ксеносов". {n}Породистое лицо и роскошная седеющая грива больше подходит аристократу, чем служителю пугающей Инквизиции. Густой низкий голос звучит одновременно властно и вкрадчиво.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorised by the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to watch over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, root out heresies, and pre-empt the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-инквизитор Ксавьер Калькасар, глава конклава Коронус. Милостью {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, я уполномочен надзирать за {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простором Коронус{/g}, искоренять ереси и предупреждать угрозу {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}". {n}Породистое лицо и роскошная седеющая грива больше подходят аристократу, чем служителю пугающей {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorized by the grace of the Emperor to watch over the Expanse, root out heresies, and preempt the xenos threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious graying mane would fit an aristocrat more than a servant of the fearsome Inquisition. His deep, low voice sounds both commanding and silken.{/n}

"Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorized by the grace of the Emperor to watch over the Expanse, root out heresies, and preempt the xenos threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious graying mane would fit an aristocrat more than a servant of the fearsome Inquisition. His deep, low voice sounds both commanding and silken.{/n}

I am authorised by the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to watch over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, root out heresies, and pre-empt the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

I am authorised by the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to watch over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, root out heresies, and pre-empt the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターのザビエル・カルカサルだ。コロヌス・コンクレイブの長を務めている。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の恩寵により、私には{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を監督し、異端を根絶し、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の脅威を阻止する権限がある」{n}血筋の良さそうな顔立ちとたてがみのように壮麗な白髪は、恐れ敬われる{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の公僕というより貴族の風格がある。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorised by the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to watch over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, root out heresies, and pre-empt the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターのザビエル・カルカサルだ。コロヌス・コンクレイブの長を務めている。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の恩寵により、私には{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を監督し、異端を根絶し、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の脅威を阻止する権限がある」{n}血筋の良さそうな顔立ちとたてがみのように壮麗な白髪は、恐れ敬われる{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の公僕というより貴族の風格がある。{/n}

languages.original_text: "Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorised by the grace of the Emperor to watch over the Koronus Expanse, root out heresies, and pre-empt the xenos threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome Inquisition.{/n}

languages.text: “科罗努斯审判庭的大审判官，希维尔·卡尔卡扎。我奉{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}之命，监管{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，铲除异端，防范{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}。”{n}光是看他肃穆的面容和浓密的灰发，他更像是出身名门的贵族，而非令人生畏的{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的忠仆。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorised by the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to watch over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, root out heresies, and pre-empt the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “科罗努斯审判庭的审判长，希维尔·卡尔卡扎。我奉{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}之命，监管{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，铲除异端，防范{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}。”{n}光是看他肃穆的面容和浓密的灰发，他更像是出身名门的贵族，而非令人生畏的{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的忠仆。{/n}

languages.text: «Lord Inquisidor Xavier Calcazar, líder del Cónclave de la Extensión de Koronus. Por la gracia del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, tengo el deber de velar por la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, erradicar la herejía y anticiparme a la amenaza {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}». {n}Su noble semblante y su gloriosa cabellera canosa parecen más dignas de un aristócrata que de un sirviente de la temible {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorised by the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to watch over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, root out heresies, and pre-empt the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lord Inquisidor Xavier Calcazar, líder del Cónclave de la Extensión de Koronus. Por la gracia del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, tengo el deber de velar por la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, erradicar la herejía y anticiparme a la amenaza {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}». {n}Su noble semblante y su gloriosa cabellera canosa parecen más dignas de un aristócrata que de un sirviente de la temible {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: « Je suis le seigneur inquisiteur Xavier Calcazar, chef du conclave de Koronus. Par la grâce de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, je suis chargé de veiller sur les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, de débusquer les hérétiques et de contrer la menace {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. » {n}Avec ses traits délicats et sa glorieuse chevelure grisonnante, il fait davantage penser à un aristocrate qu'à un serviteur de la redoutable {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorised by the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to watch over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, root out heresies, and pre-empt the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le seigneur inquisiteur Xavier Calcazar, chef du conclave de Koronus. Par la grâce de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, je suis chargé de veiller sur les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, de débusquer les hérétiques et de contrer la menace {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. » {n}Avec ses traits délicats et sa glorieuse chevelure grisonnante, il fait davantage penser à un aristocrate qu'à un serviteur de la redoutable {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: "Großinquisitor Xavier Calcazar, Oberhaupt des Koronus-Konklave. Ich bin durch die Gnade des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} autorisiert, über die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} zu wachen, die Ketzerei auszumerzen und der Bedrohung durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} zuvorzukommen." {n}Sein aristokratisches Gesicht und die ergrauende Haarmähne würden besser zu einem Adligen passen als zu einem Diener der gefürchteten {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorised by the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to watch over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, root out heresies, and pre-empt the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Großinquisitor Xavier Calcazar, Oberhaupt des Koronus-Konklave. Ich bin durch die Gnade des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} autorisiert, über die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} zu wachen, die Ketzerei auszumerzen und der Bedrohung durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} zuvorzukommen." {n}Sein aristokratisches Gesicht und die ergrauende Haarmähne würden besser zu einem Adligen passen als zu einem Diener der gefürchteten {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu Xavier Calcazar, Koronus Meclisi'nin başkanıyım. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} lütfuyla {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} kök salmış olabilecek kâfirlikleri temizlemekle ve ortaya çıkabilecek {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} tehdidinin önüne geçmekle görevlendirildim." {n}Soylu yüz hatları ve grileşmiş görkemli saçı; ismini duyanların kalbine korku salan {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} kurumunun bir hizmetkârını değil,daha çok bir aristokratı andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, head of the Koronus Conclave. I am authorised by the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to watch over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, root out heresies, and pre-empt the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} threat." {n}His highbred face and glorious greying mane would better befit an aristocrat than a servant of the fearsome {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Engizisyoncu Xavier Calcazar, Koronus Meclisi'nin başkanı. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un lütfuyla {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde kök salmış olabilecek kâfirlikleri temizlemekle ve ortaya çıkabilecek {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} tehdidinin önüne geçmekle görevlendirildim." {n}Soylu yüz hatları ve grileşmiş görkemli saçı, daha çok bir aristokratı andırıyor, ismini duyanların kalbine korku salan {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} kurumunun bir hizmetkârını değil.{/n}
